title: The Neighbor's Drunk Slutty Daughter
description: Richard is driving back to his beach house one evening when he sees the 18-year-old girl next door, Mia, staggering down the road, wearing nothing but a bikini top and a short skirt, having had a bit too much to drink.Soon she is sitting on his sofa. She is willing, but drunk; and she has a fantasy of being made love to while she sleeps.How can Richard, a 38-year-old divorcee, resist such a beauty?This 3500 word story of erotica contains graphic descriptions of sex acts, including oral and sleeping sex with a drunk but willing barely-legal girl. It contains situations which some readers may find offensive and is intended to be read only by adults.
author: Natasha Stevens
